levels.description: After deployment, immediately deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all surrounding enemies, then uses spatial Arts to drag all unblocked enemies <@ba.vup>slightly</> towards this unit and <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> them for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</>s
